text:
OSha#dhayaqH sOma#rAj~jIqH pravi#ShTAH pRuthiqvImanu# |
tAsAMq tvama#syuttaqmA praNO# jIqvAta#vE-suva || 
aqvaqpata#ntIravadan diqva OSha#dayaqH pari# | 
yaM jIqva maqS~javA# mahaiq na sa ri#ShyAtiq pUru#ShaH || 
yAScEqda mu#pa-SRuqNvantiq yASca# dUqraM parA#gatAH |
iqha saq~ggatyaq tAH sarvA# aqsmai saM da#tta BEShaqjaM ||
mA vO# riShat KaniqtA yasmai# cAqhaM KanA#mi vaH ( ) | 
dviqpa-ccatu#Shpa-daqsmAkaq(gm)q sarva#-maqstvanA#turaM || 
OSha#dhayaqH saM ~Mva#dantEq sOmE#na saqha rAj~jA$ | 
yasmai# kaqrOti# brAhmaqNasta(gm) rA#jan pArayAmasi || 28
(rapa#H - pataqtriNIq- ryA - a(gm)ha#sOq yAH - KanA#mi vOq - &ShTAda#Sa ca) (A6)
